text:
If you've ever recorded
a video on your iPhone
only to realize you can't watch it

because it was shot in
the wrong orientation,
we will show you a simple way
to rotate your saved video.

You will need to have
the iMovie app installed
before taking these steps.
First, open the photos app
and choose the video you want to rotate.

Tap "Edit" in the upper
right corner of the screen.

Then tap the three-dot icon
in the upper right corner.
Tap the iMovie icon to open the app.
Now use two fingers

and twist them in the direction
you want your video rotated
in the middle of the screen.
Tap "Done" and watch your video.

If your video doesn't
end up how you want it,
you can rotate your video again
using the same method,
or tap "Edit,"
then tap "Revert"
to bring back its original orientation.
